manifest.name: T'Compro

customers.title: T'Compro: Your Shop of Always, One Click Away in Peru
customers.description: Buy groceries, food, and essentials from your trusted local shop. Fast delivery or in-store pick-up. Access On Credit / Fiado for Trusted Customers.

customers.author: Soulware

stores.title: T'Compro Business: Your Business, Your Rules - Custom System for Peruvian Shops

stores.keywords: bodega management, inventory app, staff management, business finances, Peru, fiado control, incoming orders
stores.author: Soulware
